scripts.gen:index: echo "// Generated @radroots/radroots-common-bindings" > index.ts && for f in *.ts; do fn=$(basename "$f" .ts); [ "$fn" != "index" ] && echo "export * from './$fn';" >> index.ts; done
scripts.gen:types: command -v typeshare >/dev/null && typeshare ../../src --lang=typescript --output-file=types.ts || echo 'Skipping typeshare (not installed)'
scripts.prebuild: npm run gen:types && npm run gen:schema
